content:
From: 王淑灵 <wangsl@ios.ac.cn>
Dear all,

I am now using the new version of Isabelle/HOL in Windows and meet a problem. Whenever I write some now definition or add some code to current file, Isabelle hangs and stops compilation, and after a pretty long time, it then continuous to work. I have never met such problem before for the previous version of Isabelle/HOL. What should I do for solving this problem?

Thank you very much for your help.

Best regards,
Shuling Wang

From: Makarius <makarius@sketis.net>
It sounds like a resource problem, e.g. too little memory.

How much main memory do you have? What is your CPU? What is your Windows
version?

Makarius
